scripts.deploy-matic: node scripts/deploy-prep.js matic && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ odyssy-automaton/daohaus
scripts.deploy-main: node scripts/deploy-prep.js mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ odyssy-automaton/daohaus
scripts.deploy-kovan: node scripts/deploy-prep.js kovan && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ odyssy-automaton/daohaus-kovan
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: node scripts/deploy-prep.js rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ odyssy-automaton/daohaus-rinkeby
scripts.deploy-xdai: node scripts/deploy-prep.js xdai && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ odyssy-automaton/daohaus-xdai
scripts.deploy-bill-dev: node scripts/deploy-prep.js kovan && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ wswarren12/daohaus-ubergraph-bill --kovan
